entry.dcterms:description: family contacts with the mother, with the father living apart, with siblings, with adult children living apart, family status, contacts with grandparents, with other relatives, contacts with relatives besides the nucleus family, contacts with friends and neighbours; questions related to providing help, data on the respondents' place of residence, dwelling, profession, the economic sector of his/her place of work, social organization membership, demographical data, data on income and religion, his/her spouse's and father's data
